laboratory_examinations.findings: Total bilirubin: 1.8 mg/dL (reference range: 1.6 - 2.6 mg/dL) - within normal range.
No focal consolidation; mild left base linear atelectasis/scarring; no pleural effusion or pneumothorax; stable cardiac and mediastinal silhouettes.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Mild left base linear atelectasis/scarring in a similar location as that seen on the prior study.
